mapper.insert: insert into ec_finace_pay (cust_no, policy_no, pay_date, pay_chnl, pay_bank, pay_account, pay_ac_last_four, pay_years, pay_tm, pay_trequency, pay_amt, payable_date, pay_mode, payer, applicant, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payChnl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAcLastFour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payYears,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payableDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
